name: Madden NFL 07
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

FOOTBALL WITH A TOUCH

FEATURES
  • Use all-new Touch Screen controls to perform special moves, draw Hot Routes, and take command of your command.
  • Read opposing formations, then use voice recognition to call audibles on both sides of the ball.
  • Drag-and-drop defensive assignments before the snap with the all-new Offensive Playmaker feature.
  • The NFL comes to life with improved graphics and highly-detailed stadiums for every team.
